website_summaries.verdict: The base model MacBook Pro gets an updated processor and a price drop, making it the best choice for Mac shoppers who want a blend of power and relative affordability.
pros: Price drop from last year's model
cons: Connectivity limited to two USB-C ports

website_summaries.verdict: A pricey but superior tool for creative pros, 2018's Touch Bar version of the 13-inch MacBook Pro brings four-core moxie to Apple's handsome ultraportable, with options for cavernous local storage.
cons: Using ports will require adapters or dongles, in most cases

customer_reviews.title: Apples and trees
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Bit gutted to find in the small small print a no return policy. Received mine with a scuff on top. Perhaps these are graded products. If so, that should be disclosed.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Its a good laptop, but was described as having a UK ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a good laptop, but was described as having a UK keyboard. The item supplied has a US keyboard which is annoying and leads me to suspect it is a grey import.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: What you would expect from Apple.
customer_reviews.text: It's a Mac. What would you expect? except near perfection :-) It's very well built, extremely fast (takes less than 5 seconds to boot up) and lightweight: perfect for taking it everywhere you go. Has all of the necessary Apple software pre-installed: office suite (iWork). iPhotos, etc... handles heavy application like CAD or XCode with ease. Long lasting battery, fast dual-band WiFi (AC 5Ghs/2.4Ghz). Only issue: if you need Ethernet or DVI, you would need to purchase separate adapters.
customer_reviews.author: MFC

customer_reviews.title: What a device!
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I usually hate Apple devices. In particular due to the price point in comparison to functionality (iPhone is a great example). Not here though, I love my new MacBook Pro. Its sleek, fast and incredibly receptive. I especially like how the touchbar and trackpad works and it's ease of use. I was weighing this up against the Hauwei Pro X but I am glad I went for the MacBook. If you are thinking of buying this just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Akm

customer_reviews.title: 2018 Edition with 8th gen CPU.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially concerned that it wouldn't be the 8th gen version however I can confirm that it is. Save time and money ordering from here rather than from Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Apple or Windows, Apple or Windows...
customer_reviews.text: Never had a Mac before... Only had an iPhone once, which I didn't really like, seemed to be losing so much functionality vs android, for some superficial advantages... MacOS is so much more than IOS and so much better than Windows, both in terms of design and functionality. It has turned out to be worth the price difference (and most definitely the better pick over a similarly priced Windows laptop).
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: The 2017 version of the MacBook Pro is excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a formidable piece of kit and it looks elegant. I am delighted with it. OS Mojave takes a bit of getting used to, but I am learning its many impressive benefits when it comes to the desktop and the way it handles files, stacks etc. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Derek Denton

customer_reviews.title: Loving this Mac
customer_reviews.text: Love this MacBook Pro! It's light, it's uncluttered and attachments make it easy to navigate the older USB while it is still needed. My only reservation is with the 128GB storage but I guess it's all going to the cloud or Dropbox etc., from this point out.
customer_reviews.author: Riverboat

customer_reviews.title: Brand New 8th Gen CPU, UK version
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit sceptical at first buying from Amazon, especially for a much reduced price (£469 off RRP). Luckily the item arrived very quickly as described, brand new in original packaging. Laptop features UK keyboard, plug and the Touch Bar. Extremely pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Adamczyk

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop - but faulty
customer_reviews.text: 1st Macbook I've owned - very nice design and macOS is nice and easy to use even after only using Windows for the last 20 years. I noticed there was a vibration when you touched the case while the laptop was being charged and at first I thought this was a cool little micro motor giving some sort of feedback... I spoke with Apple support and they said this should not be happening - i Googled and found out the device is probably grounding through me! Returned for a refund and I'm really not sure how I feel about getting a new one because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I am a Big Mac fan and have been for years but Apple should be ashamed...The keys on keyboard do not respond!!! I press enter and nothing happens!! Then some letters do not respond.... Trackpad same problem it works or doesn't work. Terrible! And for a multi billion dollar company shameful.
customer_reviews.author: David Olsson

customer_reviews.title: Mostly a joy to use
customer_reviews.text: Once the transition from windows is learned this is a great machine for business travel use. downside is the need for various adaptors as usb-c connections only, a shorter than expected battery life and a few quirks with the user interface, where MS does some things better eg windows into corners, file manager remaining present after opening files, etc.
customer_reviews.author: mr andrew cameron

customer_reviews.title: Gooda and reliable laptop, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My first apple actually. Everyone told me that it's better than windows, so when my previous laptop sadly broke down after many years, I saved up something and bought this one. I got the small size, because the other one is unbelievably expensive. What's my opinion? Well I've had it for a couple of months now, and it's alright, very fast and easy to adjust to (for the newbies), the design is also really nice. Honestly, nothing special. It's a good laptop, don't get me wrong, I can brag to my friends about it, but it's overpriced. Really overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Giulietta

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, thin, and a long battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I am used to Windows OS so switching to a mac was strange at first. It's relatively easy to use but I'm still learning the keyboard shortcuts and 'gestures'. The Laptop itself is very thin and lightweight. It has a very long battery life compared to all my previous (Windows) laptops. To be honest, the OS on the mac isn't that impressive. I don't understand what all the fuss is about. I guess it's alright but I don't think it's worth the premium price tag.
customer_reviews.author: ARMACUN

customer_reviews.title: Love this MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Excellent MacBook, this was an upgrade from my 15inch 2009 MacBook Pro. I’m really pleased so far, it’s so light and fast. Brilliant for my Djing with Serato.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful machine and best user experience to date!
customer_reviews.text: I had a 2015 MacBook Pro before, this surpasses that on every level. The feel of the touchpad, the keyboard and the whole machine is better, sturdier. Better screen, better keyboard, touchpad. But the most shocking difference is the sound quality. They did a remarkable job with the speakers!!!!! Night and day difference. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: dani63

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I use this laptop for work when I can't be at my desk. I can lie the lid and start writing almost anywhere. It's well-connected and well-made. But I only own it because of a Black Friday deal from Amazon which dropped the price just enough for a few hours. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: W. Leitch

customer_reviews.title: macbook pro 2018 purchased 2019 has a significant screen interference problem
customer_reviews.text: this computer has a significant screen interference problem. How can it be fixed, still under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: stevieh

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this pc.... a very good deal!!! This is the very latest Mac book pro model and it works amazingly....I also received my parcel few days before the estimated date!
customer_reviews.author: claudia vanni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Thought long and hard about what laptop I wanted, chose this model and was about to buy from apple dealer, then noticed it on Amazon £200 cheaper. Had it a month now and love it, using it for music production and it works a dream. Lovely to use and very fast. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RY

customer_reviews.title: Pleased, but with some reservations.
customer_reviews.text: Having pondered replacing my vintage Macbook (purchased in 2010) for quite some time, I eventually opted for this new model and am delighted with it. However,I'm still baffled by the new USB ports, as I'm unable to connect my printer and other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Its a Macbook, does it need reviewing?
customer_reviews.text: Apple Macbook pro. Does what it says on the tin. In my opinion well over priced, Windows 10 much better. Still wasn't for me so can't give it a bad review. Not 5 star due to daft pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Supreme Commander Watto

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro 13
customer_reviews.text: It has an almost sheer finish that’s as pleasing to the touch as it is to the eye, powerful display and top performance make it a perfect choice for creativity. But it has a very high price and the need to buy adapters if you want more than just Thunderbolt ports, will put off some more. Also the keyboard is something that could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: It’s not what I expected but okay
customer_reviews.text: When I was buying it said “2019 model” after it’s come I found out it’s 2018 not 19. And they know that you can’t see the model info before setting it up so that you can’t return it if it’s not what you expected cause they gonna say it’s used now
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Adam

customer_reviews.title: Superfast lightweight
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the 2011 MacBook Pro it replaced. It is really fast in all respects. Screen quality is great. The Touch Bar is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: tsukroff

customer_reviews.title: Apple and Amazon the 2 richest companies treat us badly on a faulty product
customer_reviews.text: An awful product form Apple. Brand new laptop that overheats, freezes and shuts down. Then customer service is a joke. the product is less than 4 months old and both Amazon and apple know it has faults but both parties are saying its the other parties fault. Amazon I am loyal customer and you should look after me and help me out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. L. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The Product arrived and the computer was saying the battery needed replacing the 2nd didn’t arrive the 3rd one came working spoke to Apple who informed me the product was first used a year ago therefore had no warranty, spoke to amazon and after 2 hours on the phone finally spoke to someone who owned the issue and sent out a 4th when I checked that it had been first used 18 months ago and again had no warranty, check your Macs and make sure they are new when there advertised as being new
customer_reviews.author: rhys dean

customer_reviews.title: Last Mac I ever buy
customer_reviews.text: Had this for almost a year now and I wish I'd never bought the damned thing. Everything is a constant hassle, and I've ended up buying a windows machine a few months back and relegating the Mac to position as a backup device. And still, when I have to use it, I'm driven mad within the space of a few hours with all the things that need a special Mac workaround. Biggest waste of money ever.
customer_reviews.author: placidhead

customer_reviews.title: Disaster
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 54 days. Everything was fantastic then it just died. I’ve been using Apple computers for over 20 years. I’ve found them far better than anything else but I can’t believe their standards have dropped this low. It might be time to change. Apple has reached the end of the road.
customer_reviews.author: blackheathnick

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Product defective. Would not switch on, laptop would not close flush with body and keyboard defective with many stuck keys. Within 5 minute of receiving it was packed up ready for return to Amazon and a refund. Wonder now where the stock is from - hence the 10% discount. I think I’ll shop on official Apple website next time.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Slim, silent, fast and fancy.
customer_reviews.text: Great updated replacement from my old 2009 MacBook. Great value for money for a MacBook Pro. Adjusting to learn the obvious improvements!!
customer_reviews.author: Manhattan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: First Mac
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Mac after years of PCs. Really impressed so far....The laptop was the UK version as well. Well pleased..
customer_reviews.author: B Guy

customer_reviews.title: Best computer I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Black Friday this year, been brilliant ever since. I am a student in first year at university and needed a laptop that’ll last me the next 4 years studying plus anything else I might need - this MacBook is perfect. Everything is seamless, works perfectly and quickly although some features and programs take a while to work out how they work and to unlock their full potential.
customer_reviews.author: Ben P.

customer_reviews.title: It's fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: it's early days yet but I find it fast and responsive and easy to use. I have not found anything to dislike about it I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grandad

customer_reviews.title: The best for that money on the market at this moment
customer_reviews.text: This is the best choice for that price at the moment on the market. The design is clean - nothing unnecessary. The battery life is long enough. The power management is very well tuned. Apple... Maybe some USB ports will not be superfluous. But hey there is a HUBs and extensions with type c here.
customer_reviews.author: Kostadin Kostadinov

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I finally made the move to MacBook it’s a joy to use...
customer_reviews.author: citroenchris

customer_reviews.title: No more frustration
customer_reviews.text: Changing from PC to Apple Mac I thought it would take a while to get used to it.... not so. Logging back into the PC In order to change things over, well CLUNKY us the word.. love my apple mac no more frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: What a great laptop what u would expect fro
customer_reviews.text: What a great laptop what u would expect fro. Apple fast performance quality video and sound werth every penny and cheapest i found on the ne t
customer_reviews.author: Gary rigby

customer_reviews.title: Love my Mac Book Pro
customer_reviews.text: what to say i am not a Apple fan boy if i were i buy this product and use ios only but i have both ios and windows on this device and both work nice and keep up what ever i am doing
customer_reviews.author: Paula Donohue

customer_reviews.title: great for multimedia
customer_reviews.text: i ok overall just some apps are not the same as in windows. doesnt run fortnite smoothly but very slow. great for multimedia. the price makes it not worth it looking back
customer_reviews.author: julian

customer_reviews.title: Basically bad all round
customer_reviews.text: Terrible service from Apple and disgusting service from Amazon who deny what they promised me in compensation, oddly those phone records don’t exist, Amazon has gone from first choice to now last resort
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Good product, it's been fantastic in fact. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, it's been fantastic in fact. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: H. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and it didn’t even boot up. Returned it and still waiting for a refund. Very disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.author: Rebeller101

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light
customer_reviews.text: Finding this great to use , my first Apple laptop
customer_reviews.author: carol weddell

customer_reviews.title: Faulty wifi
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful product, but I had to return it due to a faulty wifi, and spend hours with Apple technical staff going through diagnosis scenarios. Amazon have been great so far at replacing it, but I am disappointed to have to return a new Apple product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Clayton

customer_reviews.title: intuitive and fast
customer_reviews.text: very happy with my new mac. intuitive and fast. boring review but thats the problem with macs - they are always amazing. thank you apple for another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I was weary about buying a macbook as I didn't think it was worth the money but this is excellent and I am definitely a Apple convert. The battery is excellent and typing for hours is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant machine.
customer_reviews.text: A superb piece of technology, evrything I expected from it and more. A truely versatile Laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Great Nol

customer_reviews.title: Its price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Macbook pro 2017 has met my expectstion and it is better than the last version 2018 which has tools bar. Also, its price is reasonsble if we compare it with Macbook 2018. I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hayder

customer_reviews.title: No one can beat this laptop for quality and performance
customer_reviews.text: Treated myself to this amazing MacBook Pro - very expensive but very worth it
customer_reviews.author: Markas

customer_reviews.title: Damn
customer_reviews.text: This MacBook is decent I like it a lot. yes it is expensive but that is because of apple not amazon so this is why its getting a 5 star rather than a 4 star. laptop is powerful and faster... just don't game on it. APPLE IS NOT FOR GAMING
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price but still not sure if the products exactly what I need. Get seller though highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. DOHERTY

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: The product description is extremely misleading. As it turns out, the 8GB RAM is actually soldered to the motherboard, therefore, this device cannot be upgraded.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal !
customer_reviews.text: Great product - and great shape it’s in ! I had expected to see more scruffs on it, but it’s almost pristine !
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Quality Apple product
customer_reviews.text: Should of brought the Mac with Touch Bar, as a friend has one and looks pretty good
customer_reviews.author: lewis harris

customer_reviews.title: Power saver
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the exquisitely sleek design, the battery lasts longer and takes even lesser time to fully charge. Only drawback is the absent USB ports
customer_reviews.author: Muse

customer_reviews.title:  MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and efficient but only two ports ?! That’s ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful machine. Lack of ports though but i guess that's the future..
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Meh expected so much more for price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly had nothing but problems visited the apple store who could not solve my issues or offer a replacement / repair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price & product. Not sure who sold it me.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure who I have bought this off as no receipt sent with parcel. Meets expectations of Apple product.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR WORK
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen, the feel and the look! Perfect for a work device.
customer_reviews.author: Samer

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, item brand new ! I received item 3 days earlier than it was expected ! love it
customer_reviews.author: Edgardas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! Having never bought a MB before I decided to jump in and purchase a pro. This is perfect for all my needs. I would say the keyboard is very loud but that is the only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and very well packaged. Excellent price for an excellent product. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Writing this review using my new Mac :)
customer_reviews.author: Ilyas Zholdasbayev

customer_reviews.title: Great seller - trustworthy. Item as described.  No problems 😊
customer_reviews.text: I received my order the very next day (less than 24 hours from ordering it) and was very impressed with the great service I received from this seller. The item was packed to a high standard and it is exactly as described and is working well without any problems. This is definitely a seller you can trust so I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: M Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this laptop, had to be returned due to having to restart it every time you wanted to change the page
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed that I have a small chip next to the speaker
customer_reviews.author: Afshean

customer_reviews.title: Fab laptop
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the MacBook. Very stylish and easy to use. This is the second MacBook I have owned and wouldn’t use any other laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

product_meta.title: Apple MacBook Pro (13-Inch, previous model, 8GB RAM, 256GB Storage) - Space Grey
